meanings.definition: Acting against or counteracting thyroid function.
meanings.sent1: The antithyroid medication helped regulate her thyroid levels.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed an antithyroid drug to balance her thyroid activity.
meanings.sent3: The antithyroid treatment made her thyroid gland do a little dance.
meanings.sent4: Her healthy lifestyle was like an antithyroid shield against thyroid issues.
meanings.sent5: The antithyroid effect of the medicine was like a superhero fighting against thyroid problems.

meanings.definition: A substance that counteracts the effects of thyroid hormones.
meanings.sent1: She took an antithyroid to manage her thyroid condition.
meanings.sent2: The antithyroid was effective in reducing her thyroid hormone levels.
meanings.sent3: The little antithyroid pill was like a tiny superhero for her thyroid.
meanings.sent4: The antithyroid acted like a shield against the overactive thyroid hormones.
meanings.sent5: Her daily dose of antithyroid was her weapon against thyroid imbalances.
